sentences.sContent: He struck at one with his knife lashed to the end of an oar and watched the scavenger sliding down into deep water.
sentences.sContent_eng: He struck at one with his knife lashed to the end of an oar and watched the scavenger sliding down into deep water.
sentences.sCn: 他用绑在桨的一头的刀子击中了其中的一条，并看着这条食腐动物滑到深海里去了。

synos.tran: [动]食腐动物；清道夫；[助剂]清除剂；拾荒者

phrases.pCn: 寻物游戏（参加者在规定的时间内寻找指定的物品，以先找到者或先找到的队为胜）

remMethod.val: 来自scavenge(v. 拾荒， 捡破烂； 以腐肉为食)
